mapper.select: SELECT P.PERFUME_NO, P.PERFUME_NAME, P.PERFUME_VITALITY, P.PERFUME_GENDER, P.FILE_NO , F.ORIGIN_NAME, F.STORED_NAME , B.BRAND_NAME FROM tb_perf P LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file F ON P.FILE_NO = F.FILE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_brand B ON P.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO WHERE P.perfume_no = #{perfumeNo }

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CASE WHEN cnt IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, cnt DESC) ranking, NR.* FROM ( SELECT MA.note_no, MA.cnt, N.note_name FROM ( SELECT note_no, count(note_like_no) cnt FROM( SELECT p.note_no, nl.note_like_no FROM tb_perf_note P LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_note_like NL ON p.perfume_no = nl.perfume_no AND p.note_no = nl.note_no WHERE p.perfume_no = #{perfumeNo } ) GROUP BY note_no ORDER BY cnt DESC) MA LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_note N ON MA.note_no = N.note_no) NR ) WHERE 4 > ranking AND CNT > 0

SELECT count(*) cnt FROM tb_perf_like WHERE perfume_islike = 0 AND perfume_no = #{perfNo }

mapper.select: SELECT plsc.*, f.stored_name, p.perfume_name, p.brand_no, p.perfume_vitality, b.brand_name FROM( SELECT PLC.perfume_no, NVL2(plc.likecnt - pdlc.dislikecnt, plc.likecnt - pdlc.dislikecnt, plc.likecnt) cnt, plc.likecnt, NVL2(dislikecnt, dislikecnt, 0) dislikecnt FROM ( SELECT perfume_no, count(*) likecnt FROM tb_perf_like WHERE perfume_islike=1 GROUP BY perfume_no) PLC LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT perfume_no, count(*) dislikecnt FROM tb_perf_like WHERE perfume_islike=0 GROUP BY perfume_no) PDLC ON plc.perfume_no = pdlc.perfume_no) PLSC LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_perf P ON plsc.perfume_no = p.perfume_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file F ON p.file_no = f.file_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_brand B ON p.brand_no = b.brand_no WHERE cnt >=1
